title: Midrash Aggadah
enDesc: Midrash Aggadah is an anonymous midrashic commentary on the Torah, first published by Solomon Buber in 1894 based on a rare manuscript that he discovered in Aleppo. The manuscript was missing several parts, including the end, where the name of the scribe and date of writing were usually recorded. Scholars believe the text dates back to the 12th or 13th century.
enShortDesc: Anonymous midrashic commentary on the Torah first discovered and published in 1894.
heShortDesc: פירוש מדרשי אנונימי על התורה, שהתגלה ופורסם לראשונה בשנת 1894.
